results.title: Amlodipine Overdose in a Transgender Woman: A Case Study
results.text_hl: Physicians should have a very high suspicion for @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ @DISEASE_Drug_Related_Side_Effects_and_Adverse_Reactions @DISEASE_MESH:D064420 @@@toxicity@@@ in cases of refractory @<m>DISEASE_Hypotension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007022 @@@hypotension@@@.

results.title: A Retrospective, Observational, EMR-Based Real-World Evidence Study to Assess the Incidence of Pedal Edema in Essential Hypertensive Patients on Amlodipine or Cilnidipine
results.text_hl: ... @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@Amlodipine@@@ demonstrated greater @<m>DISEASE_Hypotension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007022 @@@BP@@@ reduction at a lower average dose, better efficacy, and tolerability in terms of @DISEASE_Edema @DISEASE_MESH:D004487 @@@pedal edema@@@ count as a lesser number of @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ reported @DISEASE_Edema @DISEASE_MESH:D004487 @@@edema@@@ at the end of the study and a higher percentage of @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ continued the prescribed baseline dosage regimen as compared to @CHEMICAL_cilnidipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:C065927 @@@cilnidipine@@@.

citations.NLM: Dalal J, Sawhney JP, Jayagopal PB, Hazra PK, Khan MY, Gaurav K, Pinto C, Mane A, Rao S, Jain M. PMID: 35251710

results.title: Severe Amlodipine Toxicity: A Case Rescued with Extracorporeal Membrane Oxygenation
results.text_hl: Its @DISEASE_Drug_Related_Side_Effects_and_Adverse_Reactions @DISEASE_MESH:D064420 @@@toxicity@@@ is associated with severe @DISEASE_Depressive_Disorder @DISEASE_MESH:D003866 @@@myocardial depression@@@ and refractory @<m>DISEASE_Hypotension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007022 @@@hypotension@@@. We present a case of a 28-year-old female known case of @DISEASE_Epilepsy @DISEASE_MESH:D004827 @@@seizure disorder@@@ and @DISEASE_Depressive_Disorder @DISEASE_MESH:D003866 @@@depression@@@ who got admitted to our hospital with a history of consumption of 80 tablets of 5 mg @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ (total 400 mg).

citations.NLM: Sutar A, Venkategowda PM, Murthy A, Chikkaswamy SB. Severe Amlodipine Toxicity: A Case Rescued with Extracorporeal Membrane Oxygenation Indian J Crit Care Med. 2020 May;24(5):365-366. PMID: 32728332

results.title: Dosing Time Matters? Nighttime vs. Daytime Administration of Nifedipine Gastrointestinal Therapeutic System (GITS) or Amlodipine on Non-dipper Hypertension: A Randomized Controlled Trial of NARRAS
results.text_hl: In NARRAS trial, nighttime dosing of nifedipine GITS or @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine besylate@@@ had the similar effects on nocturnal @<m>DISEASE_Hypotension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007022 @@@BP reduction@@@ and did not demonstrate a clear advantage on dipping rhythm restoration over the routine morning administration.

citations.NLM: Liu J, Su X, Nie Y, Zeng Z, Chen H. Dosing Time Matters? Nighttime vs. Daytime Administration of Nifedipine Gastrointestinal Therapeutic System (GITS) or Amlodipine on Non-dipper Hypertension: A Randomized Controlled Trial of NARRAS Front Cardiovasc Med. 2021;8():755403. PMID: 34912861
citations.BibTeX: @article{34912861, title={Dosing Time Matters? Nighttime vs. Daytime Administration of Nifedipine Gastrointestinal Therapeutic System (GITS) or Amlodipine on Non-dipper Hypertension: A Randomized Controlled Trial of NARRAS}, author={Liu J and Su X and Nie Y and Zeng Z and Chen H}, journal={Front Cardiovasc Med}, volume={8}, pages={755403}}

results.title: Preoperative Amlodipine Is Efficacious in Preventing Intraoperative HDI in Pheochromocytoma: Pilot RCT.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: The median (IQR) episodes (2 [1-3] vs 0 [0-1]; P = 0.002) and duration of @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ (19 [14-42] vs 0 [0-3] minutes; P = 0.001) and intraoperative @DISEASE_Chromosomal_Instability @DISEASE_MESH:D043171 @@@HDI@@@ duration (22.85 +- 18.4% vs 2.44 +- 2.4%; CI, 8.68-32.14%; P 0.002) were significantly higher in the @CHEMICAL_Prazosin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011224 @@@prazosin@@@ GITS arm than the @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ arm, whereas episodes and duration of @<m>DISEASE_Hypotension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007022 @@@hypotension@@@ did not differ between the 2 groups.

citations.NLM: Jaiswal SK, Memon SS, Lila A, Sarathi V, Goroshi M, Garg R, Barnabas R, Hemantkumar I, Patel RD, Oak S, Dalvi A, Garale M, Patil V, Shah NS, Bandgar T. Preoperative Amlodipine Is Efficacious in Preventing Intraoperative HDI in Pheochromocytoma: Pilot RCT. J Clin Endocrinol Metab. 2021 Jul 13;106(8):e2907-e2918. PMID: 33839787

results.title: Phytochemical analysis and hypotensive potential of Teucrium stocksianum Boiss.
results.text_hl: Pretreatment with @CHEMICAL_Atropine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001285 @@@atropine@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ significantly (p<0.001) reduced the @<m>DISEASE_Hypotension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007022 @@@hypotensive@@@ and negative chronotropic and inotropic effect.
